security: Information is restricted; names and specific details are redacted which implies some ongoing protection of sources or methods.
summary: An agent report detailing Manuel Marti's education record, specifically focusing on his attendance at Theodore Roosevelt Night High School and previous education at Evander Childs High School in the Bronx, New York.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated November 21, 1968, is an agent report concerning Manuel Marti, providing details on his education. The report indicates Marti attended Theodore Roosevelt Night High School (TRNHS) in the Bronx, New York, from September 1964 to January 1965 and February 1966 to June 1966, taking Geometry and other evening courses. Information was sourced from Sylvia Polacsek, the school secretary at TRNHS on October 9, 1968. Marti's previous education includes Evander Childs High School, with no details listed regarding his employment, parents, or guardian. The report was prepared by Paul P. Baillargeon of the 108th MI Gp (I-NYFO).
title: Agent Report on Manuel Marti's Education Record
